title: Asian Shares Set for Weaker Open, Crude Oil Falls: Markets Wrap
description: Asia’s benchmark share index is set to slip from a record high after declines on Wall Street, where investors rotated out of richly valued technology stocks.
content: Asia’s benchmark share index is set to slip from a record high after declines on Wall Street, where investors rotated out of richly valued technology stocks.
